title: Dawnbringer Riven/Nightbringer Yasuo Border Question
body:
If I currently don't have the money to purchase one of the skins during the event but I manage to unlock the Icon and Border for 280 tokens, will I have the border I unlocked if I purchased the skin sometime after the event?

Disclaimer edit: The border ONLY applies to the relevant skin. This much should be obvious yet many people seemed to be confused and disappointed when they realized after buying an Order Pass.

replies.body: No worries, friend!  The border is tied to the icon, and once you've unlocked that you're all set.  You can buy the skin a year from now, and would still have the border.  Hope that helps offer some relief.  :D
